name: Godspeed (OldFacedBaby)
description:
You, a human, venture with four individual animals that consider you their companion and maybe even friend. The journey to the Wilds has you spending many nights getting to know each of them. Some nights they will divulge more information about themselves, while others, they may only decide to speak about others.

This game is meant to be an exploration of the characters within the world. The overarching story plot is still in the works.
